name: Rock Gnome
description: As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Gnomish Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

features.name: Gnomish Lineage
features.description: You know the Mending and Prestidigitation cantrips. You can spend 10 minutes casting Prestidigitation to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 HP) that produces its effect when activated with a Bonus Action. You can have three such devices at a time; each falls apart after 8 hours. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

spells.name: Mending
spells.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: A minor magical trick: create a sensory effect, light or snuff a flame, clean or soil an object, chill/warm/flavor material, create a symbol or trinket, or create an illusory image.
